name: @mongtap/mongtap
description: MongoDB-compatible MCP server with DataFlood statistical modeling and generation control ($seed, $entropy)
long_description: MongTap is a Model Context Protocol (MCP) server that provides MongoDB-compatible database functionality through statistical modeling. It allows LLMs like Claude to create, query, and manage databases using natural language, without requiring actual data storage.

tools.name: generateDataModel
tools.description: Generate a DataFlood model from sample data or description'

tools.name: startMongoServer
tools.description: Start a MongoDB-compatible server with DataFlood backing

tools.name: queryModel
tools.description: Query a DataFlood model directly. Supports generation control via $seed and $entropy parameters in the query.

tools.name: trainModel
tools.description: Train or update a model with new data

tools.name: getModelInfo
tools.description: Get detailed information about a model
